summaryOfNewsArticle: The government has launched a comprehensive policy package aimed at improving governance and efficiency in public institutions. Key components include increased transparency in public spending, significant investments in renewable energy, a nationwide push for digital transformation in public services, and targeted training programs for public sector employees to enhance their digital competence. These measures are part of a broader strategy to modernize public administration and address environmental and technological challenges. The Ministry of Finance, the Department of Energy, and the Public Service Commission are leading the implementation of these initiatives.
title: Government Launches Comprehensive Policy to Modernize Public Services and Promote Sustainability
